lead_paragraph: The death of Mahmoud Ishtiwi, who was accused of homosexuality, had all the trappings of a soap opera: sex, torture and embezzlement, in the armed wing of Hamas.

byline.original: By DIAA HADID and MAJD AL WAHEIDI

headline.print_headline: Accused of Theft and Gay Sex, Hamas Leader Is Killed by His Own
headline.main: Hamas Commander, Accused of Theft and Gay Sex, Is Killed by His Own

snippet: The death of Mahmoud Ishtiwi, who was accused of homosexuality, had all the trappings of a soap opera: sex, torture and embezzlement, in the armed wing of Hamas.
abstract: Torture and execution of prominent Hamas leader Mahmoud Ishtiwi by members of his own sect has enervated Gaza communities where group maintains power; Ishtiwi stood accused of several crimes, including embezzlement and homosexuality; case is particularly notable for his family's willingness to discuss it openly and for highlighting how increasingly hard-line Hamas leadership is willing to do away with its top figures.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
